item.description: If you're like me, you grew up watching the (two) Conan movies that helped to make Ahnald's career. Well guess what? They finally rebooted it and this time, no there are no austrians in Hyperboria. Instead, we get the guy who played the horse lord in "Game of Thrones". If you know who I'm talking about you are probably a bit psyched b/c that guy should just NINJA the role. The time below is approximate b/c they haven't specified showtimes yet.
item.name: Conan the Barbarian...THE MOVIE!!!
